Title: Summer of Sam
Overview: During the summer of 1977, a killer known as the Son of Sam keeps all of New York City on edge with a series of brutal murders.
Tagline: No one is safe from Son of Sam.
production_companies: 40 Acres & A Mule Filmworks, Touchstone Pictures
Cast: John Leguizamo, Adrien Brody, Mira Sorvino
